00022 #ifndef motion_control_h
00023 #define motion_control_h
00024 
00025 #include <avr/io.h>
00026 #include "planner.h"
00027 
00028 // Execute linear motion in absolute millimeter coordinates. Feed rate given in millimeters/second
00029 // unless invert_feed_rate is true. Then the feed_rate means that the motion should be completed in
00030 // (1 minute)/feed_rate time.
00031 void mc_line(double x, double y, double z, double a, double feed_rate, uint8_t invert_feed_rate);
00032 
00033 // Execute an arc in offset mode format. position == current xyz, target == target xyz, 
00034 // offset == offset from current xyz, axis_XXX defines circle plane in tool space, axis_linear is
00035 // the direction of helical travel, radius == circle radius, isclockwise boolean. Used
00036 // for vector transformation direction.
00037 void mc_arc(double *position, double *target, double *offset, uint8_t axis_0, uint8_t axis_1,
00038   uint8_t axis_linear, double feed_rate, uint8_t invert_feed_rate, double radius, uint8_t isclockwise);
00039   
00040 // Dwell for a specific number of seconds
00041 void mc_dwell(double seconds);
00042 
00043 // Send the tool home (not implemented)
00044 void mc_go_home();
00045 
00046 #endif
